sentences.english: We watched a performance which included a puppet show and acrobatics .
sentences.chinese: 我們觀看了一場演出，內容有木偶戲和雜技。

sentences.english: It must be very difficult for them to be trained as very skillful acrobats .
sentences.chinese: 練習出技巧高超的雜技演員肯定很難。

sentences.english: The audience held their breath as the acrobat walked along the tightrope .
sentences.chinese: 雜技演員走鋼絲時，觀從們都屏住了呼吸。

sentences.english: The great acrobat, Blondin, was very famous in the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的雜技演員布隆丁，在十九世紀時候就非常有名。

sentences.english: Dishes are stacked unstably on acrobat's head.
sentences.chinese: 雜技演員頭上晃晃悠悠地頂着一疊磁碟。

sentences.english: A pile of china dishes rested precariously on the head of the acrobat.
sentences.chinese: 雜技演員頭上危險地頂着一疊瓷碟。

sentences.english: The acrobat 's feat took the audience's breath away.
sentences.chinese: 雜技演員的驚險動作使觀衆爲之咋舌。

sentences.english: The star turn in our show tonight will be a group of Chinese acrobats .
sentences.chinese: 我們今天晚上節目中最精彩的是中國雜技表演。

sentences.english: He used to stunt-drive in acrobatic performances.
sentences.chinese: 他過去常在雜技表演中表演驅車特技。

sentences.english: These 8-year-old children will be trained as very skillful acrobats.
sentences.chinese: 這些8歲孩子將被訓練成技藝高超的雜技演員。

sentences.english: The acrobat is good at juggling with plates.
sentences.chinese: 那個雜技演員很擅長耍盤子。

sentences.english: The acrobat can turn a bat into a fat cat.
sentences.chinese: 那個雜技演員能把蝙蝠變成肥貓。

sentences.english: The excellent acrobatic performance brought down the house.
sentences.chinese: 精采的雜技表演博得全場喝采。
別擔心，他是個雜技演員。

sentences.english: Wuqiao County, Cangzhou of the world famous acrobatic village.
sentences.chinese: 滄州的吳橋縣是世界著名的雜技之鄉。

definition: to read aloud with expression/to recite/to declaim
type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
opera highlights performed as independent pieces
